content:
I'm excited to help you prepare for the Disney Princess Half Marathon! Since you've already completed a 5K, you have a good foundation to build upon. To help you prepare for the half marathon, I'd recommend creating a customized training plan that suits your fitness level and schedule.

Here's a general outline to get you started:

**Weeks 1-4:**

* Continue running 3 times a week, with one longer run (5-6 miles) on the weekends
* Incorporate speed workouts, such as interval training, to improve your running efficiency
* Start incorporating strength training exercises to target your core, glutes, and legs

**Weeks 5-8:**

* Gradually increase your weekly mileage by 10-15% each week
* Introduce hill repeats and longer runs (7-8 miles) to build endurance
* Continue strength training exercises to maintain muscle strength and endurance

**Weeks 9-12:**

* T
